definition: to pay one's respects/to give regards to
to ask
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Even so, he did what he could to greet his many friends throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 但即使这样，他仍尽可能地向世界各地的友人问安。

sentences.english: Use formal greetings when you meet teachers.
Frustrated ever hate carrying solution, greeting Moling go back west.
sentences.chinese: 失意何曾恨解携，问安归去秣陵西。

sentences.english: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity.
sentences.chinese: 你们要用爱心彼此亲嘴问安。

sentences.english: 44As soon as the sound of your greeting reached my ears, the baby in my womb leaped for joy.
sentences.chinese: 因为你问安的声音一入我耳，我腹里的胎就欢喜跳动。

sentences.english: Please say hello to your parents.
Andy talkativeness remarked Ray, it was the season why he considered to ask Andy or not.
sentences.chinese: 安迪爱挖苦雷，这就是为什么他考虑要不要问安迪。

sentences.english: "Say hello to your father, " úrsula told him.
The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.
For instance, you can greet your teachers politely and they may follow.
sentences.chinese: 例如你可以礼貌地向老师问安，让学弟学妹们效法。

sentences.english: Cor. 13:12 Greet one another with a holy kiss.
sentences.chinese: 林后十三12你们要用圣别的亲嘴彼此问安。

sentences.english: Salute one another with an holy kiss.
sentences.chinese: 你们亲嘴问安，彼此务要圣洁。

definition: to pay respects/to wish good health/in Qing times, a specific form of salutation (see also 打千[da3 qian1])
to salute/to make one's salutations
to pay a formal visit/to call to pay respects/to meet one's senior or superior
to say goodbye/leave-taking/farewells
to say hello to/to send one's regards to
to congratulate
to call to pay one's respect/to call on
to pay a return visit
morning and evening visits to parents/cf 昏定晨省[hun1 ding4 chen2 xing3]
to have an audience with
to salute/to greet
to have an audience (with the Emperor)
congratulate an elderly person on his birthday/offer birthday felicitations
to congratulate
to return a politeness/to present a gift in return
to bow down low/to make obeisance/to kneel and bow
